labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: You get taken to a blank version of the delete server page
data.expected_result: Everything proceeds as normal and you can delete and forget about that guild
data.short_description: Clicking Delete Server from the Server Settings right click menu brings you to an empty version of the delete server page
data.steps_to_repro: - Mouse over Server Settings, and scroll down to Delete Server - Click it
